topics.body:
"@Evident Disaster":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/545990706368725efc440200#post_545990706368725efc440200
6,500 cases.

The outbreak may be slowing down fortunately.  To summarize the reason why the ebola outbreak started spreading quickly was cause nobody read the fucking safety rules and were breaking quarantine left and right.

I know this is rude and mean and cruel considering that a lot of people are dying, *BUT* I think it finally registered to people that "I know I have ebola and will probably die, but if I try to run away I'm just going to infect all my loved ones and they're going to die and it's going to be my fault".

topics.body:
Ahahaha I managed to get someone into a incoherent rage to the point I couldn't understand what they were saying.

I'm going to summarize:
If you're wondering how I did that you know how I like talking about changes in society and such?  I know it's a controversial subject, but the subject was feminism; basically classical feminists are the good ones(like C H Sommers)(basically classical feminism stands for equality of both genders, anti-quotas, pro-freedom).  Third wave feminists are what you probably know as social justice warriors(towards women's supremacy, believes that if quotas aren't being met that women should be forced into a job even if she doesn't want it, anti-freedom).

Well what I did was that you know how western society is moving towards the idea of people should be treated equally?  Classical feminism as a movement may be dead, but we've won because the vast majority of the populace believes that both genders should be treated the same.

This pissed the hell out of who I was talking to cause the person wanted men to literally be nothing more than cattle, no rights to vote, no freedoms or such under the belief that was "equality".  I gave a no bullshit stuck to factual information about the general populace's beliefs and such and they got angrier and angrier and angrier because they realized that their ideals were unpopular and their hopes for how they want the world to be would never come to existence.

I'd be lying if I wasn't laughing my ass off at how angry they were getting.


Reason why I'm posting this in a nutshell:
Sometimes it's fun to poke the bear if the bear is on the other side of the bars.  Sometimes extremists are fun to make angry.


Tl:dr; well I had fun.
